original:
The Czech Prime Minister Vaclav Klaus is reportedly considering a quest to obtain a larger mandate following the Civic Democratic Party's (ODS) strong showing in the Senate elections. The ODS, which is Klaus' political party, won twelve out of the twenty-seven seats that were being contested in the elections held on October 14-15.
Klaus, who took over the premiership in 2018, currently heads a min
